This building is in located in the upper east side cross 1st Avenue,with a live in super,all pets are welcome , very pet friendly building.The laundry is located in the basement.You will get access to the subway line Q-4-5-6 .Very quiet neighborhood to live in.Conveniently located only steps away from fine dining, restaurants, shopping, and all forms of transportation. Come see it you won't regret it.

The apartment 1 bedroom home has been fully renovated with a brand new kitchen and bathroom. The apartment features a spacious living room and a very bright bedroom, faces East 88th Street, a quiet tree-lined street. The kitchen is equipped with all new stainless steel appliances, contemporary bathroom with high end fixtures.You won't be disappointed a beautiful cozy and charming apartment.

Enide Douillard Laguerre My phone is number 347-243-6027 CALL OR TEXT, I will be glad to help you along your search within your budget. I have access to everything on the market and my goal is to always offer excellent customer service. If you want an honest agent who will really listen to your needs, give me a call. Instead of just looking for your next apartment, let me help you find a place you can truly call home. My email is [email protected]
